metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3865 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Synaptics touchscreen driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5X and 9 devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 28799389.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
